Name: Maverick
About the game: In the future, America is a contaminated wasteland with more than 500 million people living in dence, populated cities. Political scandals, high crime rate and slums. A soldier in an unjust World, against swat and agents. ABOUT GAMEPLAY: -Maps can only be played in order, one after the other. -After killing enemy you will get Credits. -You have unlimited ammunition, but every shot cost GAME CURRENCY (Credits). -Player has two weapon slots. -You can not change weapon slot 1 after collect the first weapon, only the second slot can be changed. HINT: YOU CAN SET UP YOUR OWN PERSONAL INPUTS UNDER OPTION
